item.description:
Let's listen and dance to some oldies - bring your din or buy some great food at the refreshment stand... a special every year is 2 lobster salad sandwiches with french fries for approx $12...! What a steal... and yum...!

Anyone "young at heart" can ride the merry-go-round.... or just sit in there lounge chair and be old...LOL!

It's a beautiful time of the day to be at the beach... this happens every Tuesday at Easton's Beach - different type of music each week...

Event is cancelled if rain or rain is predicted - we will all keep an eye out for such...

To see the full concert schedule, you can click on the below link - we may schedule another meet up at Easton's for one of the other concerts if anyone is interested.

http://www.cityofnewport.com/departments/recreation/pdf/2012_family_concerts.pdf

Carpooling - some may want to car pool with those who have an EZ-Pass - otherwise the bridge is $4 each way... There is a Park & Ride off the Narragansett Exit off Rt 138 = the last exit before the Jamestown Bridge - I'll leave that up to you to make any carpool arrangements.
item.how_to_find_us: PICNIC TABLE AREA - I'LL HAVE A SIGN

group.name: Mingle with singles 45+ Socializing and dancing

item.name: Easton's Beach in Newport - outdoor music
